scripts.build: npm run validate && npm run build:html && npm run build:pdf
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run serve
scripts.theme:build: cd theme-src && npm run build && npm run theme:link
scripts.clean: if exist node_modules rmdir /s /q node_modules & if exist theme-src\node_modules rmdir /s /q theme-src\node_modules & if exist theme-src\dist rmdir /s /q theme-src\dist & if exist package-lock.json del /f package-lock.json
